text: Congratulations on completing part 3. Let's now check some of the concepts to ensure you've understood them. Firstly, what are the four elements that make up the volume profile? What are the major benefits to using volume profiles instead of a traditional time-based profile? And explain what discount, premium, fair value and exuberance is in terms of volume profiling. Good luck.
